scripts-info.build_all: Build all packages(ES6, CJS, AMD, Global) and generate packages
scripts-info.build_amd: Build AMD package with clean up existing build, copy source into dist
scripts-info.build_cjs: Build CJS package with clean up existing build, copy source into dist
scripts-info.build_es6: Build ES6 package with clean up existing build, copy source into dist
scripts-info.build_closure_core: Minify Global core build using closure compiler
scripts-info.build_closure_kitchensink: Minify Global kitchenSink build using closure compiler
scripts-info.build_global: Build Global package, then minify core & kitchensink build
scripts-info.build_perf: Build CJS & Global build, run macro performance test
scripts-info.build_test: Build CJS package & test spec, execute jasmine test runner
scripts-info.build_cover: Run lint to current code, build CJS & test spec, execute test coverage
scripts-info.build_docs: Build ES6 & global package, create documentation using it
scripts-info.clean_spec: Clean up existing test spec build output
scripts-info.clean_dist_amd: Clean up existing AMD package output
scripts-info.clean_dist_cjs: Clean up existing CJS package output
scripts-info.clean_dist_es6: Clean up existing ES6 package output
scripts-info.lint_perf: Run lint against performance test suite
scripts-info.test_jasmine: Execute jasmine test runner against existing test spec build
scripts-info.test_karma: Execute karma test runner against existing test spec build
scripts-info.test: Clean up existing test spec build, build test spec and execute jasmine test runner
scripts-info.tests2png: Generate marble diagram image from test spec
scripts-info.watch: Watch codebase, trigger compile when source code changes

scripts.build_all: npm run build_es6 && npm run build_amd && npm run build_cjs && npm run build_global && npm run generate_packages
scripts.build_amd: npm run clean_dist_amd && npm run copy_src_amd && npm run compile_dist_amd
scripts.build_cjs: npm run clean_dist_cjs && npm run copy_src_cjs && npm run compile_dist_cjs
scripts.build_es6: npm run clean_dist_es6 && npm run copy_src_es6 && npm run compile_dist_es6
scripts.build_global: rm -rf ./dist/global && mkdirp ./dist/global && node tools/make-umd-bundle.js && node tools/make-system-bundle.js && npm run build_closure_core && npm run build_closure_kitchensink
scripts.build_perf: npm run build_cjs && npm run build_global && webdriver-manager update && npm run perf
scripts.build_test: rm -rf ./dist/ && npm run lint && npm run build_cjs && npm run build_spec && npm run test_jasmine
scripts.build_cover: rm -rf ./dist/ && npm run lint && npm run build_cjs && npm run build_spec && npm run cover
scripts.build_docs: npm run build_es6 && npm run build_global && npm run tests2png && esdoc -c esdoc.json
scripts.cover: npm run cover_test && npm run cover_remapping
scripts.cover_remapping: remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped.json && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped.lcov -t lcovonly && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/coverage-remapped -t html
scripts.lint: npm run lint_src && npm run lint_spec && npm run lint_perf
scripts.test: npm run clean_spec && npm run build_spec && npm run test_jasmine && npm run clean_spec
scripts.tests2png: npm run build_spec && mkdirp tmp/docs/img && mkdirp spec-js/support && cp spec/support/*.json spec-js/support/ && jasmine JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=spec/support/tests2png.json
scripts.watch: watch "echo triggering build && npm run build_test && echo build completed" src -d -u -w=15
